channel.title: [Allstar] ReaperXScape (Beta) - Join Us Now!
channel.description:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=irLQmQM7s0o&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Hey, so i've seen some nice comments being posted on the server development thread so i guess ill give this a shot, remember this is beta mode, thats why its being hosted off hamachi. and also my router cant portforward (because its messed up)
so yeah i hope you guys join the server, we have usually some players on and i didnt advertise yet.
i dont feel like putting pics on so feel free to check out the server devellopment thread by clicking [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,633247.0.html]Here![/url]
you can download hamachi by clicking [url=https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/download.aspx]Here![/url]
when u download hamachi click join network networks available : reaperxbeta3 reaperxbeta4 reaperxbeta5 reaperxbeta6 reaperxbeta7 reaperxbeta8 *passwords for all groups are : reap
you can access the server website by clicking [url=http://www.reaperxscape.tk]Here![/url]
you can download the server .jar client by clicking [url=http://www.reaperxscape.smffy.com/index.php?board=21.0]Here![/url]
thanks for reading! please join the server! :)
3 staff spots available (log in and you get a chance to be staff...)

item.title: [Allstar] ReaperXScape (Beta) - Join Us Now!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I know I don’t, the reasoning to why I’m being so negative is because the things you’ve written and done annoy me (not all but some). Being too lazy to post a decent adv thread so you just link your dev thread? Their meant for two different audiences. I think what’s annoying me is your half assing it, you made an okay dev thread (I’m not talking about your server, I’m talking about the thread itself) but you make a awful server advertisement - to me your only putting in effort when you can be bothered.

I’m not going to reply to dragoners post due to the two following reasons:
I can’t really understand what he’s saying.
He’s made claims which he has based on one forum post he’s read.
This^ was written before Dragiber edited his post, his initial one was pretty different so what I said about him now seems assholish.

Read full topic
